name: Forge Dwarf
description:
WORK IN PROGRESS

I wanted to create a small but fun game that would work well on desktop as well as mobile. The main gameplay loop mimics that of an "Idle" game like Idle Slayer or Grim Clicker, but also focuses on crafting tools and runes.

The game will have the following features

  • Character stats and skill points for upgrading
  • Weapons, tools, and equippable runes
  • Forge to craft items
  • Player abilities
  • Multiple regions, enemies, and resource types
  • Achievements and Leaderboards

Known issues

  • no saving
  • ability icon timer visuals not resetting
  • too much monster meat, imbalanced drop rates 
  • crafting buttons not refreshing when getting new item/resources and crafting UI is open
  • inventory UI bugs
  • only one enemy with multiple colors
  • only one region
